course_title: Research Topics Seminar in Political Science: Tech./Innov.in Amer.Legal Syst
class_notes: (Complete Topic: Technology & Innovation in American Legal Systems)
course_description: Research Seminar on selected topics and problems in political science. Class will fulfill the "research" requirement for the political science major. May be repeated for credit when the topic varies.
prerequisites: POLS 208 or POLS_OX 208 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1996, Section #: 2, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: D. Thurman, Status: Open
